dublin_core.dcvalue: In the last two decades the use of mobile phones has increased enormously all over the world The controversy regarding whether radiofrequency RF fields exert effects upon biological systems is a concern for the general population An evaluation is made of DNA damage and cytokinetic defects proliferative potential and cell death because of RF radiation emitted by mobile phones in healthy young users
Effect of mobile phones on micronucleus frequency in human exfoliated oral mucosal cells.
